title: English Conversation Topics - Asking For A Pay-rate Increase

json.text: Are you interested in expanding your English conversation topics?
In this video, I'll share with you a simple, useful English conversation that you can use immediately
to start learning English quickly and without overwhelm. Stay tuned.
Asking for a pay-rate increase.
Hello Ms. Sara. Do you have a few minutes to talk?
Hello John. Yes, I have a few minutes to talk. What's on your mind?
I would like to discuss an increase to my hourly rate of pay.
Okay, let's talk about it. What are you thinking?
I have been working for you for a long time.
My work is always high quality and I work very quickly.
I agree with all of those things.
I would like to suggest a pay increase
to keep my hourly rate consistent with the market rate for my services.
What do you suggest the rate should be?
I thought an extra $1 per hour would be a fair increase.
Your work has been exceptional thus far and you produce work very quickly.
Will I still receive excellent value at the higher price?
I certainly assure you that you will still receive excellent value for money.
I am certain that I will too. I accept your proposed new rate of pay.
Thank you very much Ms. Sara.
You're welcome John.
I will adjust your rate in your contract so you can start billing at your new rate.
I look forward to continuing to work with you in the future.
If you enjoyed this video, subscribe to my channel.
And if you're looking for more English learning help,
make sure to click on the link and get my English conversation practice video and worksheet.
To get your hands on them, simply click the link right here, or the link in the description box.
Thanks for watching and I'll see you in the next video.
